    • Uses of ResourceFilter in com.composum.sling.core.filter

      Classes in com.composum.sling.core.filter that implement ResourceFilter 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  ResourceFilter.AbstractResourceFilter
      Base class for all ResourceFilters, extend this instead of implementing ResourceFilter to make it easier to extend the interface.
      static class  ResourceFilter.AllFilter
      the 'all enabled' implementation: filters nothing, each value is appropriate (except null values).
      static class  ResourceFilter.ContentNodeFilter
      A filter which checks that the "jcr:content"s of resources satisfy given properties.
      static class  ResourceFilter.FilterSet
      An implementation to combine ResourceFilters to complex rules.
      static class  ResourceFilter.FolderFilter
      the 'folder filter' implementation for general tree traversal
      static class  ResourceFilter.MimeTypeFilter
      A ResourceFilter implementation which checks the 'jcr:mimeType' of a resource or of its 'jcr:content' child.
      static class  ResourceFilter.NameFilter
      A ResourceFilter implementation which checks the resources name of a resource using a StringFilter for the name value.
      static class  ResourceFilter.NodeTypeFilter
      A ResourceFilter implementation which checks for JCR nodetypes similar to Node.isNodeType(String) - both primary type and all direct and inherited mixin types are checked against the filters.
      static class  ResourceFilter.PathFilter
      A ResourceFilter implementation which checks the resource path of a resource using a StringFilter for the path value.
      static class  ResourceFilter.PatternFilter
      the abstract base for all filters which are using string patterns (StringFilters)
      static class  ResourceFilter.PrimaryTypeFilter
      A ResourceFilter implementation which checks the 'jcr:primaryType' of a resource using a StringFilter for the type values.
      static class  ResourceFilter.ResourceTypeFilter
      A ResourceFilter implementation which checks the 'sling:resourceType' of a resource or its content node using a StringFilter for the type values.
      static class  ResourceFilter.TypeFilter
      a general type checking filter
      Fields in com.composum.sling.core.filter declared as ResourceFilter 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static ResourceFilter ResourceFilter.ALL
      The predefined filter instance which accepts each resource (but fails if it's null).
      static ResourceFilter ResourceFilter.FOLDER
      the predefined filter instance for folders
      Fields in com.composum.sling.core.filter with type parameters of type ResourceFilter 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected List<ResourceFilter> ResourceFilter.FilterSet.set
      the set of combined filters collected in this set
      Methods in com.composum.sling.core.filter that return ResourceFilter 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ResourceFilter ResourceFilter.ContentNodeFilter.getApplicableFilter()
      The filter that determines to which node's content node the 'contentNodeFilter' should be applied.
      ResourceFilter ResourceFilter.ContentNodeFilter.getContentNodeFilter()
      The filter the content nodes of the resources matching applicableFilter have to match.
      Methods in com.composum.sling.core.filter that return types with arguments of type ResourceFilter 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      List<ResourceFilter> ResourceFilter.FilterSet.getSet()
      Returns the list of filter elements of the filter set.
      Methods in com.composum.sling.core.filter with parameters of type ResourceFilter 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ResourceFilter.FilterSet ResourceFilter.FilterSet.Rule.of​(ResourceFilter... filters)
      Combines a set of filter instances by this combination rule.
      Constructors in com.composum.sling.core.filter with parameters of type ResourceFilter 
      Constructor Description
      ContentNodeFilter​(boolean restriction, @NotNull ResourceFilter applicableFilter, @NotNull ResourceFilter contentNodeFilter)
      Constructs a ResourceFilter.ContentNodeFilter - for documentation see there.
      FilterSet​(ResourceFilter.FilterSet.Rule rule, ResourceFilter... filters)
      Combines a set of filter instances by a combination rule

      Fields in com.composum.sling.core.mapping declared as ResourceFilter 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static ResourceFilter MappingRules.DEFAULT_NODE_FILTER
      the default filter for node traversal - system nodes, servlet paths and ACLs are disabled
      static ResourceFilter MappingRules.MAPPING_NODE_FILTER
      the default filter for export and import - system nodes and servlet paths are disabled
      ResourceFilter MappingRules.resourceFilter
      the filter for the resources in the hierarchy
